channel.title: Change uptime to 100%
channel.description:
Could you change my servers uptime to 100%? (RuneMyth) - Because its always online, but suddenly it got down to 99% while it was actually on - Or make the system better that it better recognizes if the server is online/offline
[b]Im experiencing this many times that it says offline while the server is just online!![/b] ~ RuneMyth

item.title: Change uptime to 100%
item.dc:creator: @RuneMyth RuneMyth
item.description:
@RuneMyth wrote:

Could you change my servers uptime to 100%? (RuneMyth)

  • Because its always online, but suddenly it got down to 99% while it was actually on
  • Or make the system better that it better recognizes if the server is online/offline

Im experiencing this many times that it says offline while the server is just online!!
~ RuneMyth
